CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use the Notes and Reported Issues section to elaborate on any issues. Minor issues are the ones that were too brief to troubleshoot and affected a minor % of the audience Major issues are the ones with wider impact, even if brief (like stream buffering for everyone) Major issues related to workflow different from live include Player version, Video activation, Custom fields& integrations, website, etc. Major issues related to Brightcove include account misconfiguration, platform bugs and system, issues
CustomField.label: Event Coverage Results

value.fullName: Major issues related to the customer's encoder
value.label: Major issues related to the customer's encoder

value.fullName: Major issues related to customer's network
value.label: Major issues related to customer's network

value.fullName: Major issues related to customer's workflow different from Live
value.label: Major issues related to customer's workflow different from Live
